aboutmeData.text: I am a young energetic developer who has recently dropped into the world of coding. I love learning new things so I am open to any branch of programming.
When I was in school, I worked a lot for non-profit organizations, so teamwork is not a problem. During these events, I experienced and learned a lot both on a human and teamwork level.
I gathered my professional experience during university and internships, where it can be entered during multi-stage interviews and tests.
I like to constantly improve myself so I play a lot of sports in my free time, spend meaningful time with my friends and travel when my time allows.
